metadata.description: Enhanced NPC system - includes services, behavior, and unlock conditions

greeting.default: Welcome, traveler! I sense great potential within you.
greeting.questInProgress: How goes your task? The forest awaits your efforts.
greeting.questComplete: Well done! Return to me when ready to claim your rewards.
greeting.allComplete: You've learned all I can teach. Go forth and explore!

dialogue_lines: Welcome, traveler! I sense great potential within you.
These lands are filled with resources to gather and enemies to defeat.
I have a small task for you, if you're willing to help.
dialogue.farewell: May your path be blessed with fortune!

metadata.narrative: The Elder Sage has guided countless travelers on their first steps. His wisdom is freely given to all who seek it.

greeting.default: Greetings! I've traveled far and wide seeking rare materials.
greeting.questInProgress: Have you found those materials yet? I await eagerly!
greeting.questComplete: Excellent! Those will serve my research perfectly.
greeting.allComplete: Your aid has been invaluable, friend.

dialogue_lines: Greetings! I've traveled far and wide.
I seek brave adventurers to help with my research.
dialogue.farewell: Safe travels, and may you find rare treasures!

metadata.narrative: A mysterious figure who wanders the lands collecting rare materials. His true purpose remains unknown.

greeting.default: Ho there, warrior! Ready to test your mettle?
greeting.questInProgress: Go forth and prove yourself in battle!
greeting.questComplete: Impressive! You've earned my respect and rewards.
greeting.allComplete: You are now a true warrior. Continue your training!

dialogue_lines: Ho there, warrior! Ready to test your mettle?
The wilds are dangerous, but I can help you prepare.
Defeat some enemies, and I'll reward your bravery.

metadata.narrative: A veteran warrior who trains adventurers in the art of combat. His scars tell stories of countless battles.
